621180.name: Fantasy Grounds - Ddraig Goch's Samhain Undead 1 (Token Pack)
621180.description:
Ddraig Goch's Samhain Undead Pack 1

This product depicts 68 uniquely designed, 3D rendered tokens to be used in your fantasy role-playing games. This pack consists of Skeletons, Wights, Wraiths, Vampires (both male and female), Mummy, Mummy Lord, Dragonlich, both fighting and dead, Ghosts, Spectres, Zombies, and Werewolves. And as a bonus I have included 24 prop items, from gravestones to coffins, for your Undead campaign. Happy Samhain!
This Token Pack includes:
  • Altar
  • 6 Piles of Bones
  • Campfire
  • 2 Coffins (opened and closed)
  • Female Vampire
  • 2 Ghosts
  • 2 Gravestones
  • 3 Gravestones, Fallen
  • 2 Mummys
  • Mummy Lord
  • 2 Sarcophagi
  • 10 Skeletons
  • 2 Specters
  • Tomb
  • Tombstone
  • 2 Tombstone, Broken
  • Vampire Bat
  • Vampire in Wolf Form
  • Male Vampire
  • Vampire Mist Form
  • 2 Webs
  • Weeping Angel
  • 2 Werewolves
  • 4 Wights
  • 4 Wraiths
  • 10 Zombies
  • Dragonlich
  • Dragonlich, Dead
  • Bonus Logo
Conversion by: James Holloway
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Adapted for Fantasy Grounds by:
Requires: The free Fantasy Grounds virtual tabletop (VTT) software and any ruleset.
Screenshots may differ from what you see in-game based on the extension and ruleset you have loaded.
